Address: Villa 106/2128 Phillip Island Road Cowes VIC 3922
Description:
RELAX & ENJOY
This immaculate villa located within Phillip Island's Ramada Resort and not part of the resort's rental pool offers an affordable investment opportunity or ideal family getaway.
Being one of the larger villas and in a prime position within the resort, it comprises three bedrooms, two bathrooms and a sunny, open plan living/dining and kitchen that opens onto a spacious rear deck with lovely rural views.
The resort is close to all that Cowes has to offer and only a short drive to the beach. The resort facilities include a cafe/bar, indoor gym & pool, games room, tennis court, outdoor BBQ areas and outdoor pool. All this within an easy 1.5 hour drive from Melbourne.

Description:
Will tick all your boxes
Positioned high on the hill in the established Seagrove area this large residence is ideal as a permanent home, holiday home or one for the retiree. The versatile floor plan boasts a layout that makes use of the space and lends itself to potential separate air b&b accommodation or granny flat with a self contained area with its own ensuite, kitchenette, living space and veranda.
Features include four spacious well-appointed bedrooms, master with ensuite and walk-in robe, modern open plan kitchen with stainless steel appliances and a huge living area with soaring three meter ceilings and bamboo floors that opens onto a large, partially covered, sunny entertaining deck with fantastic views of the bay, mountains and beyond.
There is also a second living area perfect for the kids and another central bathroom down stairs. Adding to this a carport, established low maintenance native gardens on a large block of approx. 667sqm plus exposed aggregate drive and side access for boat and caravan all within and easy walk to the beach and parks and close to town.
Inspection a must.

Description:
Offering Style And Seclusion
Set in a highly sought-after locale, in a peaceful Cul de Sac only 200m to the Golf Ranch and a short stroll to the popular Red Rocks Beach is this immaculately presented modern and contemporary single level residence.
This home has been brilliantly executed and is well designed, boasting a spacious open plan living, kitchen and dining area, three robed bedrooms and two bathrooms; the master is complete with walk in robe and ensuite. At the front of the residence is a second living room and a study/home office that could also be utilised as a fourth bedroom.
The chic kitchen is complimented by stone bench tops with water fall edges, stainless steel appliances; including a dishwasher, gas cooktop and electric oven.
Offering a host of additional features including split system heating and cooling, combustion heater, stringy bark flooring, LED lighting, double garage and potential side access for a boat/caravan/trailer.
There is a fabulous, undercover entertainment area at the rear which extends off the living space and overlooks the lovely private established landscaped surrounds complete with a garden seat and veggie patch.
All of this is set within a 618sqm approx. fully fenced allotment, what a perfect opportunity to secure your new permanent home or fabulous weekender!
This property for sale in Cowes is proudly presented by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.

Description:
Down The Island!
With a traditional Phillip Island design, this immaculate 3-bedroom residence epitomizes beachside living. Located in a sought-after quiet position close to shops, restaurants and the beach, this seaside escape is set on a low-maintenance 593sqm (approx.)
Having the one family love the home as their holiday home for the past 17 years, it is time to close this chapter in this family's book and pass it on to the next.
With the kitchen at the heart of the home, this little gem has it all!
Light-filled interior, polished timber floors, central kitchen and adjoining family room provides a space for easy living. An expansive outdoor covered decked area ideal for alfresco dining, overlooks the well kept yard, perfect for entertaining or relaxing with family or friends after a day at the beach.
A contemporary ensuite off the master is a great recent addition to the home. Central family bathroom perfect for the kids and visitors whilst servicing the remaining 2 bedrooms.
Double garage and plenty of off street parking, there is room for caravan, boats and guests!
With nothing to do but move in and joy being "Down The Island" this Island home will bring joy to the new owner Ideal for downsizers or those seeking a lock-up and leave getaway, this is the opportunity you have been waiting for.
This property for sale in Cowes is proudly presented by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.

Description:
APPROX 850M TO COWES BEACH
Located only a few minutes drive from the stunning north facing bay beach, Anderson Boat Ramp and Cowes shopping precinct this property represents excellent value.
Consisting of 4 well appointed and generous bedrooms/ 2 bathrooms & 2 separate living zones, is this modern & spacious single level home on a fully landscaped allotment of approximately 615sqm - the master bedroom offering a spacious ensuite and walk in robe plus built in robes in the other 3. To complete facilities there is a family bathroom including a bath and separate shower, separate toilet and laundry.
Extra features include the polished timber floors throughout, modern glass splashbacks, stone benchtops with waterfall ends, soft closing drawers, free standing stainless steel 900mm gas cook top with electric oven, two drawer dishwasher and ample storage space., the floor plan flows effortlessly from the separate formal living area into the spacious open plan living, dining space with a beautifully appointed kitchen.
Step out through the glass sliding door to a generous undercover entertaining deck, large enough for gatherings with both family and friends. The spacious rear yard also offers an additional entertaining space with a deck, low maintenance grassed area and a separate area with a garden shed.
Additional features include a lovely north facing covered front veranda, split system heating cooling, plenty of parking for a boat/caravan.
If you are looking for low maintenance living with ample room for entertaining and within walking distance to the beach, then this is the perfect property for you!

Description:
DESIRABLE ISLAND LIVING
Set at the back of this large, centrally located block of approx. 824m2, this beautifully presented home comprises two bedrooms, one bathroom and has been freshly painted throughout, and stunning hardwood floors to give you that beachy feel.
This home offers a practical living and kitchen area that opens up to a huge covered patio area where you are able to sit and look over the large open space in the front yard.
The added bonus of this property is the rear garage which has been converted into a great bungalow to be used as a games, storage or workshop area for whatever you need that extra space.
With easy potential to subdivide (STCA) this rare opportunity will not last long, inspect now!

Description:
TRADITIONAL COASTAL HOME
Located in the quiet street of Koala you will be greeted by this delightful original beach house, only 450m from the magnificent north facing beach, and only a short stroll Cowes main street offering cafes, restaurants and shopping strip.
This 2 bedroom home, boasts a wide wrap around verandah, this charm filled home has so much character it truly is a beautiful home.
The family have been using this home for many years and enjoyed it and will be sad to say goodbye but this will welcome a new start for the future owners.
It has been maintained very well over the years and is a low maintenance home exactly what you want from a beach house.
This site is generous and fully fenced approximately 715m2 plenty of room for the cars, boat, or caravan.
Additional features
- Cottage kitchen
- Open plan Kitchen, living & dining
- Combined laundry/bathroom.
- Split system heating and cooling
- Secured allotment
Call Alex Scott Cowes today to arrange your inspection 5952 2633.

Description:
PARKLAND FRONTAGE IN SEAGROVE ESTATE
This soon to be titled block of land is perfectly positioned next to parkland in the prestigious Seagrove estate. The level 392 square metre (approx.) block is due to title early/ mid 2019.
Enjoy the first class amenities this estate provides including 3 parks, playground, walking tracks and scenic lake, as well as piped LPG gas to the block, the only estate on Phillip Island to provide this service.
All services including NBN, mains and recycled class A water, sewer, power and LPG gas are available to the block. Located only 700 metres to Cowes North facing bay beaches and walking distance to the Cowes shopping centre and schools. Enquire today.

Description:
Central Location; Great Value!
Situated in a prime position, right in the heart of Cowes, is this neat and tidy unit is being offered fully furnished on a walk in walk out basis and is situated directly overlooking the pool, barbecue and playground area of this delightful family friendly complex. Located in the north west corner of the complex, the unit provides good privacy and a great place for those seeking to make it their own. Live here permanently or utilise as a holiday retreat/rental; the property comprises all you need including a spacious open plan living, kitchen and dining area, two bedrooms both with built-in-robes and a bathroom combined laundry. A great undercover outdoor entertaining area with the pool view is perfect for relaxing all year round whilst a sunny court yard at the rear of the unit offers a private entertaining space which captures the afternoon sun and includes a storage shed. Additional features include ceiling fans, one parking space, outdoor shower and low maintenance landscaped surrounds. The complex is close to great sporting facilities, approximately 200m to the Cowes beautiful north facing bay beaches and only a short stroll to the main shopping precinct. Everything is within your reach! The property presents great value for first home buyers, holiday renters or investors alike with opportunities such as this being rare.
Make the most of this central location and inspect today! A wonderful opportunity!
This property for sale in Cowes is proudly presented to you by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island

Description:
A wonderful fresh look!
This Brand-New Double Storey family residence built by Coldon Homes and located in the family friendly Shearwater Estate is set over two levels and is sure to impress those looking to enjoy the Island lifestyle whether that is for holiday or permanent living.
Downstairs offers a second living area, three robed bedrooms, laundry and main bathroom; with shower, bath and a separate toilet.
Located upstairs is a living zone, separate kitchen and dining area, master bedroom complete with a walk in robe and ensuite and a powder room. The kitchen is well designed and finished with stone benchtops, stainless steel cooking appliances and a walk-in pantry. There is also decks to the front and rear of the upstairs level with distant water glimpses.
With an abundance of features including high ceilings, double glazed windows, water glimpses from the second level, carpet & vinyl plank flooring throughout, split system heating and cooling and a large 10m x 6m garage with internal access.
All of the stress of building has been taken care of leaving you to add your own flair with the landscaping, window furnishings and driveway.
All of this is set within a 433sqm approx. allotment and is within easy walking distance to the North facing Silverleaves beach, Cowes Golf Course, Local Primary School, Doctors and Shopping precinct.
This property for sale in Cowes is proudly presented by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.

Description:
What a position!?
Brilliantly located on the main street of Cowes and within walking distance to the local shops, cafes, supermarkets, doctors, schools and beaches is this modern, double storey townhouse.
The downstairs comprises of a spacious open plan living/kitchen/dining area with direct access to the private, north facing entertainment deck, large master bedroom with walk in robe and ensuite, laundry, bathroom and separate powder room.
The polished timber staircase leads to the second floor which features another living zone and entry out onto the balcony, two generously sized bedrooms with built in robes and split system heating and cooling units, large bathroom and a separate toilet.
Other features include; single electric garage with door access to the rear yard, kitchen complete with stainless steel dishwasher, stainless steel electric oven and cooktop and stone benchtops, polished timber floors, tiles and carpet throughout, garden shed and water tank.
All of this is set within a 198 sqm approx. fenced allotment and can be offered fully furnished.
Being so beautifully designed and in such a position, this home will appeal to a wide array of buyers.
This property for sale in Cowes is proudly presented to you by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.

Description:
WALKING DISTANCE TO THE BEACH
Only a short stroll to the pristine shores of Red Rocks safety Beach, this newly renovated property is a perfect seaside retreat.
Consisting of three spacious bedrooms (all with robes- master with walk in and sliders out to the yard), two modern bathrooms- one with bathtub, open plan kitchen/dining/living area which flows out to an undercover deck.
An alfresco bar area greets you at the front door, perfect entertainer, or utilise the in ground fire pit with built in stools and generous, enclosed back yard with plenty of lawn for children and pets to play.
A long shed with concrete base adds to the outdoor undercover winter entertaining area, or storage for cars, bikes or boats.
Ready to move in or rent out for either permanent or holiday investment.
Contact Jenni Kent for private inspection: 0428566643
Insights: 603 Settlement Road, Cowes VIC 3922 was last sold in 2019 and 63 other 3 bedroom house in Cowes have recently been sold.

Description:
COTTAGE LIFESTYLE AT THE BEACH
Absolutely lovely house within Cowes and walking distance to shopping, schools and other activities. With three double bedrooms and a spacious living area this cottage style home will give the new owner a real country and town aspect of life. Extreme easy care on a great sized allotment.
3 spacious bedrooms, a large dining/kitchen and great living area with wood burning fireplace.
Outside you will find a spacious undercover entertainment area and perfect side access for additional parking.
This house can be purchased with all of the furniture if you are looking for a second/holiday home. Move straight in and enjoy the wonderful island life.

ITS ALL ABOUT THE POSITION
Vendors inviting offers
Renovate or detonate the choice is yours.
This basic 3 bedroom, 1 bathroom home is situated in a fantastic location, across the road from the Primary School & Early Learning Hub, and only a short walk to the main shopping strip of Cowes, and the beach.
With its large allotment size of approx. 625m2, there is the potential to subdivide STCA.
This is the perfect chance to enter the property market and reap the rewards in years to come.

Description:
COASTAL HOME IN THE HEART OF COWES
Move in ready! This split level three bedroom townhouse is a fantastic investment opportunity offering the convenience of maintenance free beach living. A short walk to everywhere you want to go; beach, shops, cafes and restaurants. A lovely sunny kitchen and living space opens on to your own courtyard ensuring privacy for those summer BBQs.
There is gas heating and ceiling fans in the lounge, and a well-equipped kitchen with gas cooking, single lock up garage with space for an additional car at the front. The well sized main bedroom has a private north facing balcony to enjoy the afternoon sun. A lovely property in a great location - perfect for your weekend getaway or permanent living.
With many of the units permanently rented through our company already, we have a tenant ready to move right in away.
Don’t wait, book an inspection now.

Build Your Dream Here!
Located in the newly developed and sought after Shoalhaven Estate in Cowes, is this block of land of approximately 415 square metres in an elevated position and due to be titled in April 2019. Just minutes to the stunning Cowes foreshore and a few minutes drive to the Cowes main shopping centre makes this the ideal location for your future permanent or holiday home. Start planning your dream home now!
This property for sale in Cowes, is proudly presented to you by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.

Description:
A Real Delight!
Situated in the increasingly popular Whytesands Estate only a short distance to Cowes shopping precinct and within walking distance to one of Cowes pristine north facing beaches is this functional and modern home that would suit as a family holiday retreat or permanent residence.
Enter the home and be welcomed by the very spacious and light filled living and dining area, complemented by a stylish kitchen featuring timber flooring throughout and large sliding doors leading to the undercover outdoor entertainment area, allowing the indoor and outdoor living spaces to blend with ease.
The master bedroom boasts a walk in robe and ensuite, while two further bedrooms both with built in robes share the family bathroom and the laundry has direct access to the expansive, low maintenance back yard.
All set on a 573sqm (approx.) fully fenced allotment, this home offers a host of additional features including spit system heating and cooling, double car garage with internal access, fully landscaped front and rear gardens and side access with room to sore a caravan or a boat!
This property for sale in Cowes, is proudly presented to you by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.

Description:
VIEWS VIEWS VIEWS
The complete package awaits, nestled in this quiet pocket in central Cowes with amazing views of Westernport Bay from the lower and upper levels.
Watch the fishing vessels, whales, the local ferry and shipping containers hold in the passage to enter Hastings on the Peninsular.
The townhouse has two levels with all kitchen/dining/WC and living downstairs. 2 X Bedrooms and bathroom upstairs.
Park the car and walk to everything. Enjoy the privacy or let family and friends enjoy the perfect location.
Don’t miss out.

Description:
EXCEPTIONAL BLOCK READY TO BUILD
Here is an exceptional block of land located in the award winning Seagrove Estate in Cowes, Phillip Island's premier estate. The last of it's kind in this estate, the 570 square metre block (approx.) is only a short stroll to the beach and Cowes shopping precinct with potential water views from a two storey home.
Fully fenced with all services available including gas (the only estate on the island that provides a reticulated gas service) the allotment is surrounded by quality homes and is only a short walk to all the estate facilities including parkland, playgrounds, BBQ areas, lake and boardwalks. Enquire today.

Description:
Perfectly Positioned in Seagrove.
Perfectly positioned with the walking track to the Cowes beach at the rear, this beautiful home is set in manicured gardens. If quality and a spacious floor plan is high on your list, then this is a must to inspect. The entry hall features American Oak boards and leads you into a formal lounge and then the huge open plan family living areas. The house has perfect orientation to the north with large decked areas and a sheltered alfresco area to the west. The living areas flow seamlessly from the inside to out and the gardens are always a restful feature.
The galley style kitchen features stainless steel appliances with a large under bench oven and gas hob and caesarstone benchtops, an abundance of cupboards and drawers for storage and a double door pantry. The dining area is large enough to comfortably seat 10 and the family living with combustion heating and a split system, opens to the alfresco - perfect spaces for entertaining.
The master suite is at the front of the home and has a large walk in robe and en suite with double basins with tasteful tiling and caesarstone benchtops.
Three double bedrooms all with built in robes share a family bathroom with separate toilet. Storage solutions are solved with linen cupboards and a well fitted laundry room.
The property is a joy to live in and is self sustainable with double glazing and a northerly orientation, one seldom needs to use heating or cooling and there is a 5.6 kw solar system on the roof and gas piped to the house from the Seagrove gas storage.
We invite you to inspect this beautiful home.
